channel.title: Beyond The Law w/ Charlie Sheen
channel.description:
Beyond The Law http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103805/ [img]http://ia.imdb.com/media/imdb/01/I/72/08/73m.jpg[/img]
This movie is a true story about cop Daniel Saxon (played by Charlie Sheen) who goes undercover in The Jackels, a biker gang, filled with drug pettlers, rapists, and murderers like all biker gangs. It's a Crime Drama and to a lot of people I have talked to most have said "It was a great fuckin movie!" :)
There is a good amount of action and it will keep you on the edge of your seat. The constant thoughts of [i]is he going to get caught? is he going to jail? will he die?[/i] comes from Charlie Sheen's great acting. If you haven't seen it or choose not to see it, then man you are missing out.
If you don't feel like renting it then you can download it on your comp via torrents. Torrent Link: http://www.torrentportal.com/details/1278036/Beyond+the+Law.avi.torrent
Enjoy. :D
~Ron

item.title: Beyond The Law w/ Charlie Sheen
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Beyond The Law

IMDb

Beyond the Law (1993) - IMDb

Directed by Larry Ferguson. With Charlie Sheen, Linda Fiorentino, Michael Madsen, Courtney B. Vance. An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars.


This movie is a true story about cop Daniel Saxon (played by Charlie Sheen) who goes undercover in The Jackels, a biker gang, filled with drug pettlers, rapists, and murderers like all biker gangs. It’s a Crime Drama and to a lot of people I have talked to most have said “It was a great fuckin movie!”

There is a good amount of action and it will keep you on the edge of your seat. The constant thoughts of is he going to get caught? is he going to jail? will he die? comes from Charlie Sheen’s great acting. If you haven’t seen it or choose not to see it, then man you are missing out.

If you don’t feel like renting it then you can download it on your comp via torrents.
Torrent Link: http://www.torrentportal.com/details/1278036/Beyond+the+Law.avi.torrent

Enjoy.

~Ron
